name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Derrick R. TAYLOR, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Derrick R. TAYLOR, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
The order of the court of common pleas denying post-conviction relief is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Dennis H. Eisman, Needleman, Needleman, Tabb & Eisman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
347 A.2d 484
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Derrick R. TAYLOR, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 1975.
Dennis H. Eisman, Needleman, Needleman, Tabb & Eisman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
